programme.title: A Prayer for the Damned
programme.desc: Thirteen years after the American Civil War, three mysterious characters converge upon a strange New Mexico Territory town on a quest for a lost Confederate fortune.

programme.title: The Sisters Brothers

programme.desc: A Deputy U.S. Marshal arrives to escort a man to California to testify against a gang; guest Dan Duryea.

programme.desc: A hired hand (Claude Akins) victimizes the Cartwrights' disabled neighbor (Harry Townes).

programme.desc: Red derails a mining car before it can crush him; the henchmen escape with the rancher's money.

programme.desc: Red escapes from the water tank hazard and orders the cowhands to start moving the cattle to the Lazy-W Ranch; Hanlon learns of this plan and prepares to stop them.
